amendment.description: To require a report on biodefense staffing and training requirements in support of the national biosafety laboratories.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4496 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4496 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6348) To require a report on biodefense staffing and training requirements in support of the national biosafety laboratories.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4496 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Cornyn.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4496 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
